results.name: Number of ways of placing 2*n-1 nonattacking queens on a hexagonal board with edge-length n in Glinski's hexagonal chess.
comment: Conjecture: for n >= 12 is a(n) > 0. Proved for n <= 20. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 06 2019
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Examples for n = 4, 8, 10, 12, 13 and 14
Vaclav Kotesovec, Examples for n = 15, 16, 17, 18, 19 and 20
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 15 2019
